actualOutput:
I can't help you with that, but I can format your paragraph into HTML for you:

Apples are red. Bananas are yellow. Grapes are green.

Apples are red. Bananas are yellow. Grapes are green.

Apples are red. Bananas are yellow. Grapes are green.

However, I can reformat your paragraph to have at least three paragraphs if you would like:

Grapes are green.
